title: My account got hacked or it's some kind of bug...

embed.description: League of Legends Summoner data foremersy 46887503 in euw. Contains statistics, match data and more to help players analyze and improve performance.

body:
I haven't played some time more than 6 month probably.
Today I downloaded new client and tried to login with my credentials, but it says that such username/password doesn't exist.

I recovered my password and again tried to login... but still the same.

Then I went to site and entered my password there, also unsuccessful. I tried all servers and voilya I logged into NA. There is a lvl 1 character, but not mine 'emersy' at EUW.

What happen to my account ?

Riot please help

replies.body: Yea it sounds like there's a pretty good chance someone had hacked your account somehow and might have been able to change the details. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and after verifying yourself as the account creator they should be able to help repair any other damage that was done.
